sentence_zh_TW: 四月通常在春天開始時是一個充滿花朵和新生命的月份。
sentence: ________ is typically a month that marks the beginning of spring, filled with flowers and new life.

sentence_zh_TW: 參加比賽的每一位運動員都必須理解團隊合作的價值，以便在比賽中獲得成功。
sentence: Every athlete participating in the competition must understand the value of working as a ______ to achieve success in the game.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這座城市中，住宅單位的空間變得越來越小，這對家庭生活造成了挑戰。
sentence: In this city, the ______ of residential units has become smaller and smaller, posing challenges for family life.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多已婚人士會選擇在繁忙的工作日後享受家庭晚餐的時光。
sentence: Many ______ individuals choose to enjoy family dinners after a busy workday.

sentence_zh_TW: 這種植物在五顏六色的花朵中綻放，為花園增添了生機與美感。
sentence: This ______ blooms with colorful flowers, adding vitality and beauty to the garden.

sentence_zh_TW: 他每星期都會給他的祖父寫一封信件，分享他的生活和近況。
sentence: He writes a ______ to his grandfather every week to share updates about his life.

sentence_zh_TW: 這家商店正在進行特別的促銷活動，購買任意兩個產品可以享受折扣。
sentence: The store is having a special promotion where you can get a discount when you buy any ______ products.

sentence_zh_TW: 公司的秘書負責安排會議並確保所有的文件按時完成。
sentence: The company's ______ is responsible for scheduling meetings and ensuring all documents are completed on time.

sentence_zh_TW: 在北半球，秋天的季節通常始於九月，氣溫逐漸變得涼爽。
sentence: In the Northern Hemisphere, the ______ season usually begins in September, with temperatures gradually becoming cooler.

sentence_zh_TW: 在晴朗的日子裡，陽光會使整個公園顯得更加明亮和宜人，吸引了很多人前來遊玩。
sentence: On a ______ day, the sunlight makes the whole park look brighter and more pleasant, attracting many people to come and play.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次會議上，專家們將講話，分享他們對當前挑戰的看法，並提出解決方案。
sentence: During this conference, experts will ______, sharing their perspectives on the current challenges and suggesting solutions.

sentence_zh_TW: 在早餐時，很多人喜歡享用新鮮出爐的麵包，搭配黃油和果醬，這是一天中的美好開始。
sentence: At breakfast, many people enjoy fresh out-of-the-oven ______, paired with butter and jam, making for a wonderful start to the day.

sentence_zh_TW: 在運動時，強健的腿部肌肉對於提高運動表現和保持平衡是至關重要的。
sentence: When engaging in sports, strong ______ muscles are crucial for improving performance and maintaining balance.

sentence_zh_TW: 農場裡的牛是牛奶和肉類的主要來源，是農業生產中重要的一環。
sentence: The ______ on the farm are a primary source of milk and meat, making them a crucial component of agricultural production.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了確保服務質量，客戶需要按時支付他們的賬單，這樣公司才能正常運作。
sentence: To ensure service quality, customers need to timely ______ their bills, so that the company can operate smoothly.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個城市裡，貧窮的一部分人口面臨著挑戰，因此社會福利計劃正在努力改善他們的生活狀況。
sentence: In this city, a portion of the ______ population faces challenges, and thus social welfare programs are striving to improve their living conditions.

sentence_zh_TW: 本月的總計支出顯示出需要更加仔細地檢查公司預算以確保可持續發展的必要性。
sentence: The ______ expenses for this month indicate the necessity of scrutinizing the company budget more carefully to ensure sustainability.

sentence_zh_TW: 他們正在考慮購買一棟新房子，以便讓家庭有更多的空間舒適地生活。
sentence: They are considering buying a new ______ so that the family will have more space to live comfortably.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個遊戲中，玩家需要收集五個特定的物品才能獲得獎勵，這使得遊戲更具挑戰性和趣味性。
sentence: In this game, players need to collect ______ specific items to earn rewards, making the game more challenging and fun.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個故事裡，主人公隨時願意幫助任何事物，即使是在最困難的情況下也不會退縮。
sentence: In this story, the protagonist is always willing to help ______, showing resilience even in the toughest situations.
